IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE. <<<", "title": "$:/plugins/yaisog/choose-random-filter/license", "modified": "20230128094837322", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki" }, "$:/plugins/yaisog/choose-random-filter/readme": { "created": "20230128094810871", "text": " \define set-size() 49 \define number-of-draws() 6 |!purpose |select one or more random tiddlers from the input | |!input |a selection of titles | |!suffix |`A` = optional `all` flag | |!parameter |`N` = an integer, defaulting to 1 | |!output |one or more randomly selected tiddlers | The `choose-random` filter operator is used to select random tiddler(s) from the input. The parameter `N` determines the number of returned tiddlers. When the suffix `all` is used, all input tiddlers are returned. Tiddlers are returned in random order, so that the filter can also be used to shuffle lists (with the `all` suffix). ''Important Notice''
The output of `choose-random` will change with each page refresh (see examples below). In order to e.g. display a random tiddler that does not change with every keystroke or mouse click, use an action widget to save a random tiddler title to a (temporary) tiddler and use that tiddler's value. The action widget could be triggered by e.g. a startup action, a button click or even a timer (requires additional plugin).
Refer to the last examples below. !! Examples !!! Random image Random image from the core:
<$transclude tiddler={{{ [all[shadows]prefix[$:/core/images/]choose-random[]] }}} /> ``` [all[shadows]prefix[$:/core/images/]choose-random[]] ``` !!! Random sub-list Three random image tiddlers:
<$list filter="[all[shadows]prefix[$:/core/images/]choose-random[3]]"> ''<$text text=<> />''
``` [all[shadows]prefix[$:/core/images/]choose-random[3]] ``` !!! Shuffle list Shuffle the numbers from 1 to 10: ''<$text text={{{ [range[10]choose-random:all[]join[ ]] }}} />'' ``` [range[10]choose-random:all[]join[ ]] ``` !!! Persistent random title Only updated when a corresponding action is triggered <$button actions="""<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/persistent-choose-random" $value={{{ [all[shadows+tiddlers]choose-random[]] }}} />"""> Click here <$link to={{$:/temp/persistent-choose-random}}/> ``` <$button actions="""<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/persistent-choose-random" $value={{{ [all[shadows+tiddlers]choose-random[]] }}} />"""> Click here <$link to={{$:/temp/persistent-choose-random}}/> ``` !!! Lotto 6 drawings from the set [1,49] without replacement: <$button actions="""<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/choose-random-lotto" $value={{{ [rangechoose-randomnsort[]join[ ]] }}} />"""> Play Lotto! ''<$text text={{$:/temp/choose-random-lotto}} />'' ``` \define set-size() 49 \define number-of-draws() 6 <$button actions="""<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/choose-random-lotto" $value={{{ [rangechoose-randomnsort[]join[ ]] }}} />"""> Play Lotto! ''<$text text={{$:/temp/choose-random-lotto}} />'' ``` This is considerably simpler ~WikiText than trying to do this with a [[simple random number generator|$:/plugins/yaisog/modules/filters/random.js]]. --- Hat tip to Jeremy Ruston for the persistent storage idea.", "title": "$:/plugins/yaisog/choose-random-filter/readme", "modified": "20230128103457996", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki" }, "$:/plugins/yaisog/modules/filters/choose-random.js": { "created": "20230128090131884", "text": "/*\ title: $:/plugins/yaisog/modules/filters/choose-random.js type: application/javascript module-type: filteroperator Filter operator for generating a random integer value within optional limits. \*/ (function(){ /*jslint node: true, browser: true */ /*global $tw: false */ "use strict"; /* Export our filter function */ exports["choose-random"] = function(source,operator,options) { var count = $tw.utils.getInt(operator.operand,1), original = [], results = []; /* build array from input tiddlers */ source(function(tiddler,title) { original.push(title); }); if(operator.suffix==="all") { count = original.length; } else { count = Math.min(count,original.length); } for(var i=0; i
